objects.specification: The floor is constructed of polished light-tone wooden planks with a subtle oak grain texture that lends warmth and natural character. A durable matte finish minimizes glare under overhead LEDs while providing secure footing and reducing reflections. The seamless layout spans the entire room to create a cohesive and inviting educational environment.

The front wall is painted in a soft mint green with a custom dinosaur-themed vinyl mural featuring silhouettes of various species wandering in a prehistoric landscape. The lightly textured acrylic paint finish reduces glare and enhances the vibrancy of the graphics, creating an engaging focal point for lessons.

The back wall is finished in a neutral cream tone and showcases a large hand-painted mural of a T-rex amid lush ferns. Executed in muted earth tones with low-sheen acrylics, the scene brings depth and immersion while remaining easy to maintain.

The left wall is painted in a gentle pastel blue and serves as an accent surface for educational posters and a wall clock. The finish is slightly textured to reduce glare and facilitate mounting of lightweight decorations.

The right wall is finished in a warm pastel yellow and features a large window with flowing curtains and additional framed posters. The low-sheen paint balances natural and artificial light while providing a bright backdrop for displays.

The teacher’s desk is a robust rectangular table crafted from dark walnut veneer with chamfered edges. It features integrated cable management channels, a large front drawer, and a matte polyurethane surface sealing it against scratches and spills. The design balances professional aesthetics with durable functionality.

The teacher’s chair is an ergonomic swivel seat with a high mesh back and contoured cushion upholstered in charcoal fabric. Equipped with height adjustment, tilt locking, and five-point caster base, it provides comfort and mobility for extended teaching sessions.

A large matte green writing surface mounted on a slim aluminum frame, complete with an integrated chalk tray and anti-glare coating for clear visibility under classroom lighting. Engineered for easy erasure and long-term durability.

A single-student rectangular desk featuring a light natural oak laminate tabletop with gently rounded corners. It is supported by powder-coated steel legs in muted gray and includes a recessed storage compartment beneath the surface. Scaled for elementary use, it is durable, easy to clean, and designed to foster focus.

A child-sized chair with a gently curved plastic seat in a complementary pastel tone. The molded backrest offers ergonomic support, and the tubular steel legs terminate in protective feet for stability. The smooth finish allows for easy cleaning and long-term reliability.

A vivid prehistoric mural depicting multiple dinosaur species roaming a lush fern landscape. Executed in bold primary colors with dynamic brushwork to convey movement and depth, it immerses students in an engaging visual story that complements the classroom theme.

A tall wooden bookshelf with a dark walnut finish featuring five adjustable shelves stocked with dinosaur-themed books and educational materials. Subtle crown molding and a clear varnish protect the surfaces while adding a refined classroom accent.

A half-scale resin replica of a Triceratops skeleton painted in off-white matte finish to simulate aged bone. Articulated joints and a stable mount capture anatomical detail, creating a realistic educational model.

A half-scale resin replica of a Velociraptor skeleton painted in off-white matte finish to simulate aged bone. Articulated joints and a stable mount capture anatomical detail, creating a compelling museum-style exhibit.
A rectangular window with clear tempered glass panes in a thin white wooden frame featuring subtle bevel details. It maximizes natural light while maintaining thermal efficiency and visual clarity.
Lightweight fabric curtains in soft pastel green with a subtle leaf motif in earth tones. The panels hang from a discreet rod and can be drawn or parted to control daylight and privacy.
A circular wall clock with a white face, bold black numerals, and a thin aluminum bezel. The silent sweep quartz movement ensures quiet operation, and a clear acrylic cover protects the dial.

An educational poster printed on matte laminated paper illustrating key dinosaur facts including species names, eras, and sizes. Full-color graphics and labeled diagrams make it both attractive and informative for classroom display.

A prehistoric timeline poster on matte laminated stock charting major geological periods and corresponding dinosaur species. The clear chronological layout and color-coded bands aid in visual learning.

A motivational wall poster featuring stylized typography that reads 'Dig for Knowledge' alongside a playful dinosaur silhouette. Printed on semi-gloss paper, it energizes the space with a fun educational message.
A chart poster illustrating the relative sizes of various dinosaur species with scaled silhouettes and labeled metrics. Printed on durable matte paper, it supports comparative learning.

A decorative potted plant with lush broad green leaves set in a simple terra-cotta pot. The foliage adds a natural accent and promotes a calming atmosphere while contributing to better indoor air quality.
A small cylindrical waste bin with a matte gray finish and a removable inner liner. Its compact design fits discreetly near the teacher’s desk while providing convenient disposal.
A small cylindrical waste bin with a matte gray finish and a removable inner liner. Its compact design fits discreetly near the teacher’s desk while providing convenient disposal.
A small cylindrical waste bin with a matte gray finish and a removable inner liner. Its compact design sits at the back left corner of the classroom for student use.
A small cylindrical waste bin with a matte gray finish and a removable inner liner. Positioned at the back right corner for student convenience.

A recessed LED ceiling panel with a white diffusing cover that provides even, flicker-free illumination. The slim design integrates seamlessly into the ceiling grid, offering dimmable energy-efficient lighting.
